Package com.univpm.oop.WeatherPal.model.Statistics

Class Stats

java.lang.Object
com.univpm.oop.WeatherPal.model.Statistics.Stats
public class Stats extends Object
Class that stores all the statistics of a set of meteorological forecasts

  • Constructor Details

    • Stats

      public Stats(Vector<? extends Forecast> forecasts) throws EmptyVectorException
      Constructs a stats object containing all the statistics on a set of Forecast (or subclasses), passed with a Vector.

      If is passed a vector of DailyForecast, then the attributes of this object will be objects of Population<DailyMeasure<? extends Number>> class.

      If is passed a vector of HourlyForecast, then the attributes of this object will be objects of Population<InstantMeasure<? extends Number>> class.

      Parameters:
      forecasts - : vector of Forecast or subclasses, that contains the dataset of measures
      Throws:
      EmptyVectorException - if forecasts is empty
